channel.title: 562 anti hack help
channel.description: Any idea how i can stop cheat clients from connecting to my 562 server. Its getting very frustrating and I'm pretty desprate, so any help is very much appreciated. Thanks again.

item.title: 562 anti hack help
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Create a packet with a distinctive id and some data, maybe a string with a password which sends to your server upon login, if the packet is read and the password is correct, proceed with the login if not disconnect. Simple.

Read full topic
